cards.name: KURIBOH
cards.description: During damage calculation, if your opponent's monster attacks (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle.

cards.name: DARK MAGICIAN GIRL
cards.description: Gains 300 ATK for every "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in the GYs.

cards.name: METEOR BLACK DRAGON
cards.description: "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" + "Meteor Dragon"

cards.name: BLUE-EYES WHITE DRAGON
cards.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

cards.name: SLIFER THE SKY DRAGON
cards.description: Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Send it to the GY. Gains 1000 ATK/DEF for each card in your hand. If a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your opponent's field in Attack Position: That monster(s) loses 2000 ATK, then if its ATK has been reduced to 0 as a result, destroy it.

cards.name: OBELISK THE TORMENTOR
cards.description: Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Neither player can target this card with card effects. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Send it to the GY. You can Tribute 2 monsters; destroy all monsters your opponent controls. This card cannot declare an attack the turn this effect is activated.

cards.name: POT OF GREED
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: CONVERING FIRE
cards.description: During the Damage Step, if an opponent's monster attacks your monster: Target 1 other face-up monster you control; your attacked monster gains ATK equal to that target's ATK, during the Damage Step only.

cards.name: POLYMERIZATION
cards.description: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.

cards.name: DARK HOLE
cards.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

cards.name: DARK RULER HA DES
cards.description: Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. Negate the effects of monsters destroyed by battle with Fiend monsters you control.

cards.name: FORTRESS WHALE
cards.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon 'Fortress Whale'. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 7 or more.

cards.name: MERMAIL ABYSSBALAEN
cards.description: You can discard 4 other Mermail monsters to the Graveyard; Special Summon this card from your hand. When you do: Target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of Mermail monsters in your Graveyard (if possible); this card gains 500 ATK, and if it does, destroy those targets (if any). You can Tribute 1 other face-up Attack Position Mermail monster; this card gains the following effect this turn.

cards.name: JURRAC METEOR
cards.description: Jurrac Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuner Dinosaur-Type monsters. When this card is Synchro Summoned, destroy all cards on the field. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Tuner monster from your Graveyard.

cards.name: URIA, LORD OF SEARING FLAMES
cards.description: Jurrac Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuner Dinosaur-Type monsters. When this card is Synchro Summoned, destroy all cards on the field. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Tuner monster from your Graveyard.

cards.name: ARCANA FORCE EX - THE DARK RULER
cards.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 monsters you control to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Special Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect.

cards.name: THE WINGED DRAGON OF RA
cards.description: Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, other cards and effects cannot be activated. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can pay LP so that you only have 100 left; this card gains ATK/DEF equal to the amount of LP paid. You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

cards.name: BLOOD SUCKER
cards.description: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the GY.

cards.name: ALEXANDRIE DRAGON
cards.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

cards.name: AQUA MADOOR
cards.description: A wizard of the waters that conjures a liquid wall to crush any enemies that oppose him.

cards.name: DARK MAGICIAN
cards.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

cards.name: DARK MAGICIAN GIRL THE DRAGON KNIGHT
cards.description: 'Dark Magician Girl' + 1 Dragon monster Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials or with 'The Eye of Timaeus'. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target.

cards.name: ANCIENT DRAGON
cards.description: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: You can increase this card's Level by 1 and ATK by 500.

cards.name: AROMAGE MARJORAM
cards.description:
While your LP are higher than your opponent's, you take no battle damage from attacks involving your Plant monsters. 
●You can only use each of the following effects of 'Aromage Marjoram' once per turn. When a Plant monster you control is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then gain 500 LP. 
●If you gain LP: Target cards in your opponent's GY, up to the number of 'Aroma' monsters you control; banish them.

cards.name: BEAN SOLDIER
cards.description: A plant-warrior that attacks with seeds and sword.

cards.name: ELEMENTAL HERO KNOSPE
cards.description: Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: It gains 100 ATK and loses 100 DEF. While you control another face-up 'Elemental HERO' monster, your opponent cannot target this card for an attack, and this card can attack your opponent directly.

cards.name: ERICA THE RIKKA FAIRY
cards.description: When an attack is declared involving another Plant monster you control: You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; that monster you control gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. If a Plant monster(s) you control is Tributed, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of 'Erica the Rikka Fairy' once per turn.

cards.name: FAIRY KING ALBVERDICH
cards.description:
2 Level 4 EARTH monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; all non-EARTH monsters currently on the field lose 500 ATK and DEF.

cards.name: BABY DRAGON
cards.description: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

cards.name: DRAGON BUSTER DESTRUCTOIN SWORD
cards.description: You can target 1 'Buster Blader' you control; equip this monster from your hand or field to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster, your opponent cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can Special Summon this equipped card. You can only use this effect of 'Dragon Buster Destruction Sword' once per turn.
